DOC.detailed_description: Rationale : Until investigated whether placement implant SS patient less successful compare non-SS patient . The risk factor efficacy dental implant dry mouth patient know lack scientific evidence . Objective : investigate change marginal peri-implant bone loss clinical performance dental implant SS patient compare implant healthy patient . Study design : A prospective multicenter clinical trial . Study population : N = 120 Intervention : All patient receive Biohorizons Laser-lok bonelevel implant replace miss ( pre ) molars support full denture upper low jaw . This study comprise four study group : - 30 human adult affect SS need replacement miss premolar molar upper low jaw . - 30 healthy human adult need replacement miss premolar molar upper low jaw . - 30 human edentulous adult affect SS need stabilization denture . - 30 healthy human edentulous adult need stabilization denture . Main study parameters/endpoints : change marginal peri-implant bone loss dental implant healthy SS group difference clinical performance 1.5 year finalization .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion ( dentate group , Sjögren ) : The patient least 18 year younger 70 ; A diagnose ( AECG guideline ; see attachment ; Vitali et al. , 2002 ) primary secondary Syndrome Sjögren ; The miss lose tooth/teeth premolar and/or molar upper low jaw . Sufficient healthy vital bone insert dental implant minimum length 8 mm least 3.8 mm diameter . In case insufficient bone volume , bone augmentation procedure perform autologue bone . If necessary autologue bone mixed artificial bone ( artificial bone graft substitute combination membrane ) . The implant site must free infection ; Adequate oral hygiene ( modify plaque index modify sulcus bleed index ≤ 1 ) ( Mombelli et al. , 1987 ; Loe Silness , 1963 ) Sufficient mesiodistal , buccolingual , interocclusal space placement anatomic restoration ; The patient capable understand give informed consent . Inclusion criterion ( edentulous group , Sjögren ) : The patient least 18 year younger 70 ; A diagnose ( AECG guideline ; Vitali et al. , 2002 ) primary secondary Syndrome Sjögren The patient edentulous . Before final inclusion study patient edentulous 1 year . Problems conventional denture retention , stability and/or adaptation , could solve implant , supported denture ( low or/and upper jaw ) . If necessary autologue bone mixed artificial bone ( artificial bone graft substitute combination membrane ) . Inclusion criterion control group : The inclusion criterion healthy control group similar Sjögren group without Sjögren criterion . Exclusion criterion : Criteria use exclude patient study follow : Medical general contraindication surgical procedure ; Presence active uncontrolled periodontal disease express probe pocket depths > 4mm bleed upon probe ; Smoking ( patient stop smoke six week operation include ) ; A history radiotherapy head neck region ; Use intravenous bisphosphonates use oral bisphosphonates 5 year .
